title: I Can't Install League Of Legends
body: Long story short, my League client didn't open after the 6.22 patch was released, so I uninstalled League and tried re-installing it, but the installer I downloaded from leagueoflegends.com isn't opening on my pc.  Help is appreciated.

replies.body:
What happens when you try launching the installer? Can you restart your computer and give it another go? 

Let me know what errors or specific behavior you notice.

I've restarted my pc a couple of times.  The way it goes is, I double click the installer, and nothing ever happens.  In my task manager, I can see a background process (not an application process) labelled "This installer database contains the logic and data required to install League of Legends. (32 bit)"

Ah, thanks for clarifying. I think there are a number of factors that could be causing this, and our [Patching Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) should be able to provide some steps that may resolve this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
